remarks: One of the conditions showing ` CH ` is an ortholattice.  (This corresponds to axiom "ax-r5" in the Quantum Logic Explorer.) (Contributed by NM, 4-Aug-2004.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
qlaxr5.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
qlaxr5.2 $e |- B e. CH $.
qlaxr5.3 $e |- C e. CH $.
qlaxr5.4 $e |- A = B $.
qlaxr5i $p |- ( A vH C ) = ( B vH C ) $.
